SENT.plain: We carried out the cytogenetic investigation of bone marrow aspirate from 32 patients with different types of MDS
The patients were from 8 regions of Ukraine
11 patients had abnormal karyotype, and the transformation to AML were observed in 5 of them (45.5%)
27% of all patients had chromosomal changes with 3 or more chromosomes involved
The highest percentage of the patients with chromosomal anomalies (66.7%) was in cases of RAEB
Chromosome deletions were the most frequently detected karyotype abnormalities
We consider the phenomenon of chromosome fragmentation as the cytogenetic approval of the increased level of apoptosis in patients with MDS
The risk of the transformation to AML was measured using new international score system IPSS
